sentences.en: Fortunately, iron or iron alloys are available which combine high permeability with small hysteresis loss.
sentences.cn: 幸而, 目下已有兼备高磁导率和低磁导率损耗的铁和铁合金,可资利用.

sentences.en: Histamine causes vasoconstriction and increased permeability of small venules.
sentences.cn: 组织胺能引起血管收缩,并增强小静脉的透性.

sentences.en: It is evident that the permeability is not a constant.
It'seems likely that the drug resistance is caused by permeability changes rather than enzyme deficiency.
sentences.cn: 抗药性似乎是由渗透性改变而不是酶缺损而引起的.

sentences.en: Permeability is an important parameter for a oil reservoir characterization and engineering.
sentences.cn: 渗透率是油藏描述和油藏工程中一关键性的参数.

sentences.en: Permeability is the ability of the formation to conduct fluids.
sentences.cn: 渗透率是岩层传导流体的能力.

sentences.en: Predrilling reservoir quality prediction includes porosity prediction and permeability prediction.
sentences.cn: 储层质量钻前预测包括储层孔隙度预测和渗透率预测.

sentences.en: Rice acidic to slightly acidic soil reaction, permeability good, arable was good.
sentences.cn: 水稻土呈酸性至微酸性反应, 通透性好, 可耕性良好.

sentences.en: The idea behind enhanced, or engineered, geothermal systems is to inject water underground to enhance the permeability of rock, allowing for the release and capture of more heat.
sentences.cn: 增强型的或是工程型的地热系统将水注入到地下，使岩石的渗透性提高，这样便可以吸收或释放更多热量。

sentences.en: The most frequent reaction causing the self - sealing of rocks with high secondary permeability is argillization.
sentences.cn: 这种发生频率很高的、使次生渗透性能良好的岩体产生自封闭现象的反应就是泥岩化.

sentences.en: The most interesting dimension of this is what Google Search Appliance says about the increasing permeability of a company and the outside world.
sentences.cn: 其中，最有趣的一点是谷歌搜索设备所反映的“公司和外部世界日益增加的渗透性”。

sentences.en: The name " intrinsic permeability " is now generally accepted as being characteristic of the medium alone.
sentences.cn: “ 间隙渗透率 ” 这个名词现在一般只作为介质本身的特性.

sentences.en: The permeability of a soil is important for calculations of underground flow.
sentences.cn: 土的渗透性对于地下液流的计算很为重要.

sentences.en: The results indicated coupling between the seepage permeability in low permeability rock.
sentences.cn: 实验结果表明:低渗透岩石渗流过程中存在明显的流固耦合效应.

sentences.en: This adversely affects water movement, permeability, and aeration.
sentences.cn: 这对水分移动, 渗透度及通气性有不利影响.

sentences.en: This fatliquor has showed the excellent characterization of permeability and fatliquoring.
sentences.cn: 结果表明:此加脂剂具有良好的加脂和渗透性能.

sentences.en: This fluid and permeability restoration 98 % is observed in core experiments.
sentences.cn: 室内岩芯流动实验中含粘土岩芯的渗透率恢复%98%.
